{"id":938733068,"question_id":2751,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1Â year, 1Â month","timestamp":1682307130,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"54 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/938733068/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Sliding Subarray Beauty","memory":"59.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int[] getSubarrayBeauty(int[] nums, int k, int x) {\n        int len = nums.length;\n        \n        \n        int[] counter = new int[50];\n        int[] res = new int[len-k+1];\n        \n        \n        for(int ed=0; ed<len; ed++){\n            if(nums[ed]<0)\n                counter[nums[ed]+50]++;\n            \n            if(ed-k>=0 && nums[ed-k]<0)\n                counter[nums[ed-k]+50]--;\n            \n            if(ed-k+1<0) continue;\n                \n            for(int j=0, cnt=0; j<50; j++){\n                cnt+=counter[j];\n                if(cnt>=x){\n                    res[ed-k+1] = j-50;\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n            \n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n    \n    /*\n    public int[] getSubarrayBeauty(int[] nums, int k, int x) {\n        int[] counter = new int[50], ans = new int[nums.length - k + 1];;\n        for (int i = 0; i < nums.length; i++) {\n            if (nums[i] < 0) counter[nums[i] + 50]++;\n            if (i - k >= 0 && nums[i - k] < 0) counter[nums[i - k] + 50]--;\n            if (i - k + 1 < 0) continue;\n            for (int j = 0, count = 0; j < 50; j++) {\n                count += counter[j];\n                if (count >= x) {\n                    ans[i - k + 1] = j - 50;\n                    break;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }*/\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"sliding-subarray-beauty","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
